question: Which among the following terms of utmost significance in the dynamics of resource management was coined in the ‘Brundtland Commission Report’?
explanation: Brundtland Commission was named after Gro Harlem Brundtland, the former Prime Minister of Norway. This commission, formally known as  World Commission on Environment and Development (WCED) was established by UN in 1983. It had released its report called  Brundtland Report in 1987. This report popularized the term Sustainable Development.
